badges.info: Gradient color is priority over background color

logo.name: Logo

paragraph.content: Add a brand description to your store's footer.

custom.name: Custom font name

type_header_font.label: Font
type_header_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

type_body_font.label: Font
type_body_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

variant_pills.name: Variant pills
variant_pills.paragraph: Variant pills are one way of displaying your product variants. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/page-types#variant-picker-block)

popups.name: Dropdowns and pop-ups
popups.paragraph: Affects areas like navigation dropdowns, pop-up modals, and cart pop-ups.

settings.paragraph: Cart and checkout prices always show currency codes. Example: $1.00 USD.

collection.label: Collection
collection.info: Visible when cart drawer is empty.

paragraph__grid.content: Affects areas with multiple columns or rows.

dbtfy_wish_list_enable.label: Enable Wish list
dbtfy_wish_list_enable.info: Allow customers to add their favorite products to a wish list they can return to later. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054299-how-to-enable-the-wish-list-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

dbtfy_wish_list_hover.label: Show on hover
dbtfy_wish_list_hover.info: Show the wish list icon when hovering over the cart product grid.

dbtfy_quick_compare_enable.label: Enable Quick compare
dbtfy_quick_compare_enable.info: Allow customers to add their favorite products to a wish list they can return to later. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/5054299-how-to-enable-the-quick-compare-add-on-in-the-debutify-theme)

dbtfy_quick_compare_hover.label: Show on hover
dbtfy_quick_compare_hover.info: Show the icon when hovering over the cart product grid.

zooming.name: ‚ö° Product Zooming

images_scroll.label: Loading image for endless scroll

help.paid_info: To enable/disable a widget, go to 'Theme Settings' > '‚ö° Paid widgets'

title.info: Bold certain words to highlight them with a different color.

custom_icon.label: Custom icon
custom_icon.info: Recommend dimension 16x16 and format should be svg or transparent png

cursor_img.label: Custom cursor
cursor_img.info: Recommend high resolution image at least 50x50 and format should be svg, png, jpg, jpeg or webp.

help.info: Customize scrollbars and cursors to perfectly match your brand‚Äôs style and identity.

cart_favicon.label: Cart favicon
cart_favicon.info: The favicon for the cart page. This is used in the browser tab and the shortcut icon for the mobile app.

cart_error_favicon.label: Cart error favicon
cart_error_favicon.info: The favicon for the cart page when there is an error. This is used in the browser tab and the shortcut icon for the mobile app.

cart_error_favicon_duration.label: Cart error favicon duration
cart_error_favicon_duration.info: The duration in seconds to display the cart error favicon.

help.info: Swap the page favicon to a secondary image when a product is added to the cart.

text.info: Use {amount} to display the amount and {discount} to display the discount

subheading.default: Get {amount}{discount} off your first purchase by subscribing to our newsletter.

subheading.default: Copy the discount code below and paste it at checkout to get your discount!

options__4.label: Scroll depth to [x] percentages of page

time.label: Time
time.info: Popup will be displayed after [x] seconds.

scroll_depth.label: Scroll depth
scroll_depth.info: Popup will be displayed when customer is scrolling page by [x] percentages.

customer_tag.label: Customer Tag
customer_tag.info: Tag will be added to this customer and can be used to trigger email automation.
customer_tag.paragraph: Any customers who sign up will have an account created for them in Shopify. [View customers](/admin/customers?query=&accepts_marketing=1)

help.info: Display a customizable newsletter pop-up to capture visitor emails before they leave.

paragraph.content: Use this section to enable a 'Back to Top' button that helps users quickly scroll back to the top of the page.

help.info: Let users quickly return to the top of the page with a single click, no scrolling needed.

dbtfy_shop_protect_disable_best_selling.info: Make sure your collections are not sorted by best selling. [Edit collection sorting](/admin/collections)

help.info: Protect your product description, images, articles, and other content from being stolen.

verify_birth_error_text.label: Verify birthdate error text
verify_birth_error_text.info: This text will be displayed when the user does not select their birthdate.

help.info: Verify visitors age to ensure compliance before allowing access to your store.

text.default: {product_title} item has been added to your cart

text.info: Use {product_title} to display the product title

time_heading.info: The time input will be restricted to only valid values between 0 and 23, using a 24-hour format. Only one number, representing the hour, will be accepted (e.g., 0, 2, 3, ..., 20, 21, 22, 23, 23).

display_style.label: Display style

dbtfy_order_feedback_question.default: How did you hear about us?

free_product.label: Free product
